results.name: Additive with a(p^e) = A007306(e).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
xref: Differs from A122810 for the first time at n=48, where a(48) = 4, while A122810(48) = 5.
